accountId.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products. For example, *5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5*.

name.description: This property is no longer available . See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

key.description: This property is no longer available. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

html.description: The display name, email address, and key of the user with the matched query string highlighted with the HTML bold tag.

displayName.description: The display name of the user. Depending on the userâ€™s privacy setting, this may be returned as null.

avatarUrl.description: The avatar URL of the user.

items.description: A user found in a search.

total.description: The total number of users found in the search.

header.description: Header text indicating the number of users in the response and the total number of users found in the search.

users.description: The list of users found in a search, including header text (Showing X of Y matching users) and total of matched users.

header.description: Header text indicating the number of groups in the response and the total number of groups found in the search.

total.description: The total number of groups found in the search.

html.description: The group name with the matched query string highlighted with the HTML bold tag.

title.description: The title of the group label.

type.description: The type of the group label.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, if available, which uniquely identifies the group across all Atlassian products. For example, *952d12c3-5b5b-4d04-bb32-44d383afc4b2*.

items.description: A group found in a search.

groups.description: The list of groups found in a search, including header text (Showing X of Y matching groups) and total of matched groups.
